name: Fierce Fighters ProtoType 2
description:
Fierce Fighters is a samurai game that is under development. In addition, this is prototype 2. Compared to prototype 1. Prototype 1 has infinite jumping, and no camera follow. Prototype 2 has jumping,wall jump, go throughs platforms (Only if they are standing on a movable platform they can choose to drop down), camera follows but shakes like crazy.

The square is a test before we create or add in a sprite.

He can jump, and wall jump. There is a trick to the walll jump.
